price: Kuma ya ce da wanda ya tabbatar da cẽwa shi mai kuɓuta ne daga gare su, "Ka ambacẽ ni a wurin uban gidanka." Sai Shaiɗan ya mantar da shi tunãwar Ubangijinsa, sabõda haka ya zauna a cikin kurkuku 'yan shekaru.
arabic: وَقَالَ لِلَّذِي ظَنَّ أَنَّهُۥ نَاجٖ مِّنۡهُمَا ٱذۡكُرۡنِي عِندَ رَبِّكَ فَأَنسَىٰهُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ ذِكۡرَ رَبِّهِۦ فَلَبِثَ فِي ٱلسِّجۡنِ بِضۡعَ سِنِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla lilladhī ẓanna annahu nājin min'humā udh'kur'nī ʿinda rabbika fa-ansāhu al-shayṭānu dhik'ra rabbihi falabitha fī al-sij'ni biḍ'ʿa sinīna
